name: Manamune
passive: Attack Damage equal to 1.5% of max Mana and refunds 15% of all Mana spent. Mana Charge: Increases max Mana by 15 every attack or when Mana is spent. Caps at 700 , bonus Mana, transforming Manamune into Muramana. Triggers up to 3 times every 12 seconds. You may only carry one Tear of the Goddess item at a time. 2700 Manamune TIPS: This item is perfect for AD champions who rely on mana and abilities to deal damage. It provides bonuses to attack damage, maximum mana, and ability haste, allowing you to use your abilities effectively. The "Mana Charge" effect increases your mana with each attack or mana usage, which significantly boosts your damage once the item is completed. After reaching the maximum bonus mana, the item transforms into Muramana, greatly enhancing your attacks. It’s an excellent choice for champions who use mana to activate their abilities, such as Ezreal or Twitch.
